Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.travelplanner.controller.HomeController
@Controller public class HomeController extends Object
Controller for handling home, registration, and login related requests.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/") public String home()
      Handles requests to the root URL ("/").
      Returns:
      the name of the home view (index.html).

    • showRegistrationForm

      @GetMapping("/register") public String showRegistrationForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles requests to show the registration form.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      the name of the registration view (register.html).

    • registerUser

      @PostMapping("/register") public String registerUser(@Valid @ModelAttribute("user") @Valid User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the form submission for user registration.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to be registered.
      bindingResult - the result of validation.
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the login page on success, or the registration view on failure.

    • showLoginForm

      @GetMapping("/login") public String showLoginForm()
      Handles requests to show the login form.
      Returns:
      the name of the login view (login.html).

    • error

      @GetMapping("/error") public String error()
      Handles requests to the error page.
      Returns:
      the name of the error view (error.html).
